document_data.name: Purple Library
document_data.mainbody: The '''Purple Library''' was a library in [[Deep Imaskar]]. It dedicated to the memory of the ancient [[Imaskar]]i.
document_data.Location: The Purple Library was located in [[Deep Imaskar]].
document_data.Structure: The Library had a number of extradimensional vaults.
document_data.Services: Besides holding the tomes of ancient Imaskari history commissioned by Lord Ilphemon, the library kept a number of artifacts and a great deal of arcane writings,{{cite book/Darkvision|51|6}} including some esoteric lore about [[Pandorym]].{{cite book/Darkvision|215-216!23}} It had tomes on anatomy and monsters, though they were sadly out of date.{{cite book/Darkvision|41|5}}
document_data.History: The Purple Library was built to hold the tome of Imaskari history commissioned by Lord [[Ilphemon]].
